title: Juan Cruz Mallía
text:
Juan Cruz Mallía is an <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He plays on the wing or centre.
He has played for the <a href="Jaguares%20%28Super%20Rugby%29">Jaguares</a> in <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a>.
He made his Super Rugby debut vs the Chiefs in .
In May 2021 he won the European Champions Cup playing for Toulouse.
